Trigger.Name: Tailwind
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Tailwind

Trigger.Name: Primordial Crust
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Primordial Crust

Trigger.RegularExpression: The ancient dragon readies Rime Wreath

Trigger.RegularExpression: The ancient dragon uses Frost Breath

Trigger.RegularExpression: Omega readies Starboard Wave Cannon Surge

Trigger.Name: Last Kiss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:312f:(?<char>[a-zA-Z']*) [a-zA-Z']{1,} suffers the effect of Last Kiss

Trigger.Name: Rage of Bahamut
Trigger.RegularExpression: Bahamut Prime readies Rage of Bahamut

Trigger.Name: Empty Hate

Trigger.Name: Tsunami Debuff
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of (?<waters>Scouring|Smothering|Splashing|Sundering|Surging|Sweeping|Swirling) Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: Tsunami Timers
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of (?<waters>Smothering|Surging) Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: Dynamo Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path

Trigger.Name: Dynamo Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my foes

Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, exalt you the red moon

Trigger.Name: Divebomb Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, scorch you the earth

Trigger.Name: Jump Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the hallowed moon to call

Trigger.Name: Jump Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the iron path to walk

Trigger.Name: Beam Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: Blazing path, lead me to iron rule

Trigger.Name: Jump Dynamo Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: From on high I descend, the moon and stars to bring

Trigger.RegularExpression: Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge

Trigger.RegularExpression: Unbending iron, take fire and descend

Trigger.Name: Dynamo Jump Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: From hallowed moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread

Trigger.Name: Dynamo Chariot Jump
Trigger.RegularExpression: From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my descent to wield
